Julaphone Julie Pierce

My Loving Wife

Julie leaning against a wall at the Sheldon Art Gallery.

  • 1994 - Born in Burnsville, Minnesota
  • 2012 - Graduated from Burnsville High School
  • 2012 - Joined the United States Marine Corps
  • 2013 - Stationed at Camp Lejeune, North Carolina
  • 2016 - Sea depolyment to Artic Circle
  • 2016 - Married Samuel Pierce in Roca, Nebraska
  • 2017 - Began undergraduate degree at the University of Nebraska - Lincoln
  • 2018 - Studied abroad in Berlin, Germany
  • 2021 -Moved to Atlanta, Georgia
